title: Hillandale Golf Course – Where Great Golf Happens
snippet: Open to the public, and featuring the nationally-acclaimed Hillandale Golf Shop, the course features four distinct teeing areas, ranging from 4,954 yards to the 6,339 yards from the back tees.

title: Home | Hillandale Farms
snippet: Founded in 1958, Hillandale Farms has grown from a humble egg distribution company into one of the leading egg producers in the United States — now proudly part of Global Eggs, the second-largest egg company in the world.

title: Hillandale, Maryland - Wikipedia
snippet: Hillandale is an unincorporated area and census-designated place located in Montgomery and Prince George's counties, Maryland, United States.

title: The Hillandale Citizens Association, Inc.
snippet: This website is dedicated to providing you with information about the community and is maintained by the Hillandale Citizens Association, Inc. (HCA) which was established in 1937.

title: HILLANDALE GOLF COURSE - Updated January 2026 - Yelp
snippet: Hillandale Golf Course, with its ideal location in Durham, North Carolina, is easily one of the most popular public golf course layouts in the entire Durham/Research Triangle area.
